entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:18 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
